query:
SELECT 
  source,
  COUNT(*) as total_events,
  SUM(CASE WHEN images IS NOT NULL AND JSON_LENGTH(images) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as events_with_images,
  SUM(CASE WHEN venue IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as events_with_venue
FROM standardized_events
GROUP BY source
ORDER BY source;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user XDitxHfNNmk4atg.root --database JQrfdruCyxS49XrmnYUv4K --execute 
SELECT 
  source,
  COUNT(*) as total_events,
  SUM(CASE WHEN images IS NOT NULL AND JSON_LENGTH(images) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as events_with_images,
  SUM(CASE WHEN venue IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as events_with_venue
FROM standardized_events
GROUP BY source
ORDER BY source;
